job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of human expertise with AI systems to improve the AI's performance, which falls under improving existing systems and integrating different capabilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the process of improving AI models through feedback and participation in fine-tuning sessions, aligning with the definition of model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies are core software development activities, even when applied to AI.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of different capabilities (human and AI) to deliver a service, fitting the definition of software development and integration.

soft_skills.phrase: taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: The expectation to ramp up quickly on multiple products highlights a need for rapid learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, as the role requires individuals to unblock themselves.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on integrating AI capabilities into customer support resolutions and improving AI systems (Macro-Category A tasks like 'Software Development & Integration'). While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning and feedback, the core responsibility appears to be the application and enhancement of existing AI within a support context, rather than deep model development or specialized GenAI tasks. The role is about using AI to augment a software-driven support function.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI integration and improvement within a support context. The distinction between core AI development and AI-augmented application support is reasonably clear, leading to a high confidence score. However, the lack of specific technology mentions prevents a perfect score.
